website_summaries.verdict: A great option for more casual golfers looking to get some great distance.
pros: The Velocity series has a bigger core, which provides more ball speed for more distance
Can still be used for putting as well
Much more affordable than some other Titleist series
cons: These don't have the same control on the green as the Pro VI series and are more suited for beginners or those who don't play regularly

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: When Titleist stopped making the NXT I had to find a new ball. The "Tour Soft" was advertised as the replacement for NXT. Except it is not an equivalent at all. The "Tour Soft" is made to be a soft-feel ball, while the NXT was a harder feel. I shot like crap for most of the season (average of 8 strokes off my handi), but then I did a lot of homework and tried the Velocity ball. Problem fixed. Titleist really made me mad with this episode.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Titleist Velocity Golf Balls
customer_reviews.text: A golfing partner of mine turned me on to these golf balls and have no regretted it since. In my book, these are these golf balls are by far the best for control, distance and overall game play. I have far better control and distance with these balls than various others I have used over the years. May be worth a shot to help improve your game a little!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball. Great color
customer_reviews.text: Why they didn’t make colored golf balls popular sooner is beyond me. I’m not good at golf, so I won’t comment on how they hit. Best I can tell you is they are as good as any other Titleist I’ve used. What I can tell you is the orange is amazing. It is so easy to track the ball in a air, and find it in the rough, woods, etc. if you miss the fairway like me, or it’s a difficult day to follow your ball. Use these.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Distance Improved as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these because I have some Hi-bore clubs, they limit my distance some, but I give it up for the forgiveness on accuracy. I've tried a few golf balls for distance improvement and I was interested in these when they came out. They did improve my average distance by roughly 10-20 yards on average. Thats the exact improvement I was looking for with these balls. Did not give a 5 star because they exterior is fairly soft, scuffed up fairly easily in my experience with them. Would purchase again, but cant afford to keep switching the balls out because of softness.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Previous order 2 dozen,  not one
customer_reviews.text: So this was a reorder of a previous order and the original order was 2 dozen golf balls at this price not just one which is what showed up today. If you look at my previous orders it clearly shows it being 2 dozen, not one. Very disappointed as I can do better at Dicks for a single dozen.
customer_reviews.author: mark r stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great balls, tried out several side by side w ...
customer_reviews.text: Great balls, tried out several side by side w driver, goes same distance as the ProV and has decent spin rate Feel is slight softer feel on ProV models, but this are durable and still have good reliable iron approach distance and stop on green 145 wedge hit pin high, bounded forward then backed up 5 feet. ProV did same, landed a bit past and sucked back 10 feet
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Braun

customer_reviews.title: Very nice balls!
customer_reviews.text: As a leisure golfer, I ordered a set some time back just to try a new color. I was very pleased with the flight of the ball and the ease of spotting the ball on the fairway (when I actually got it on there). I ordered a second set but it never showed up after quite some time. I contacted the vendor and they immediately offered a refund or a replacement. I chose the refund, but then the balls showed up later. I contacted the vendor to inform them that I received the order, and they stated that I could go ahead and keep them at no charge. Great vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Morfin

customer_reviews.title: but the dull color makes the ball difficult to find in certain ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball plays well, but the dull color makes the ball difficult to find in certain fairway grasses, especially if the grass is a bit tall, or browning.
customer_reviews.author: LewCenter

customer_reviews.title: Great golf balls!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a ton of different types of golf balls. These are just as good and even better then some high end balls!! There long off the driver and still soft enough for around the greens. Really what else are you looking for?!!?!
customer_reviews.author: Osterhoff40

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Balls are not at all controllable, little control around the greens. I'll stick w/my Srixon Z-Stars & Soft Feel balls. Would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: It's a titleist!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite golf ball. I love the distance it has and it plays well around the green. Good value for the price of the ball. I enjoy the white ball better because the orange ball is more difficult to see in the air flight of the ball.
customer_reviews.author: wwa

customer_reviews.title: Distance...
customer_reviews.text: These balls fly. I’ve played these and Calloway diablos and Pro V1s on the same course. Velocities are10 yards longer off my irons (when I hit them pure). Not as forgiving as diablos and not as good on the greens as Pro V1s, but longer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: T Money

customer_reviews.title: Condition of package
customer_reviews.text: These are the golf balls my husband uses and the cost was decent on Amazon. We could not believe the condition of the box when he opened the package. It was just unacceptable. There was no damage to the golf balls but the titleist box itself was mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsy Dagger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these - a shame I'm going to lose them so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Ryan lam

customer_reviews.title: Good golf balls for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like the titleist velocity golf balls. They feel good off the club. Hold pretty well on the green too. Also I can lose these ball just like I loae other balls. 😁 Good balls for your money
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Last years version
customer_reviews.text: Just received my golf balls. They are last years version, the box they came in is not the box pictured, which is the current 2019 version. They are from 2018, nice bait and switch Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Straight, long and durable.
customer_reviews.text: For my money, these are the most durable, accurate and long balls available. I have tested several different high-quality golf balls and for the price point these are my go-to choice.
customer_reviews.author: ffinch66

customer_reviews.title: Titleist Velocity Golf Balls (One Dozen)
customer_reviews.text: I personally only play Titleist and these were a little soft hitting greens. More distance maybe but definitely less backspin. Still a great ball.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Rodgers 4 Prez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. This was only my second time golfing so I don't know much about the difference between balls. But I ordered the pink because they are so much easier to find when you slice off the fairway. I'm not usually a pink person, but they also shimmered in the sun. So added bonus for me. I will likely buy then again since I lost a good portion of them in the weeds and water.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Sokol

customer_reviews.title: great ball
customer_reviews.text: Good titlist ball. 10 HCP. I have played for about 1 year now. Orange is a good color in the rough to see. Ball lasts about 3 rounds with limited wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical Titleist premium quality golf balls, and orange coloe makes them easy to find.
customer_reviews.text: Titleist balls are renowned for their quality and playing features, and these Velocity series balls in orange are perfect for me, a high-handicap golfer who needs as much distance as possible on drives and good controllability for iron shots.
customer_reviews.author: Spa Razorback

customer_reviews.title: Solid ball, Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife and her distance has improved over the Bridgestone E6 she was using. Love the glossy pink of this older version, don't care for the new matte color on this year's version
customer_reviews.author: rbl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Ball
customer_reviews.text: Switched from ProV. Feels great at contact, much better value. Currently my ball of choice for quality and value
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Golf Balls
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Velocity golf balls, soft feel and great distance. The double digit's are a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: golf couple

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nit sure what I expected but these balls do not carry as well as my other brand. May just be me.
customer_reviews.author: David Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Stay with the ProV
customer_reviews.text: I tried these as an alternative to ProV's, they are not in the same league. The ball shows where after 3 holes. The ball does not hold the green as well, it seems to explode off the face of the club. For reference I am a 5 handicap. I am staying with the ProV's.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fisher

customer_reviews.title: What is to know? I have purchased them again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase golf balls to lose them, doesn't everyone? I am a repeat customer and will purchase them again when I get low. BTW, they perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie E

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's favorite
customer_reviews.text: His perfect choice. He losses them, I keep ordering them. So convenient.
customer_reviews.author: TX Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladies Golf Balls!
customer_reviews.text: This golf balls really tend to go the distance. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: Really like these balls. Great distance and good control with the short game.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Decent ball
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why, but I seem to hit these crisp and straight.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Titleist
customer_reviews.text: These are good balls. A little harder than I usually hit. But good distance off the tee.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Just like titleist golf balls
customer_reviews.text: These ball just seems to go further with more accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: GJH-Florida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - my husband loves these. Now, if he could aim them in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Son-in-law Christmas gift ~ His favorite brand ~ He was pleased...
customer_reviews.author: AgateVicki

customer_reviews.title: Save the money
customer_reviews.text: No longer playing pro v 1 and now just as happy and saving money.
customer_reviews.author: ronald a friedman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a golfer and TITLEIST is an excellent brand
customer_reviews.text: Golfers love these orange golf balls. They are easy to spot and easy to find!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good golf balls
customer_reviews.text: Quick delevery and free with Amazon Prime. Good distance but some unexpected difficulty in seeing orange color.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best ball ever period..
customer_reviews.text: I shoot in the low 40's.. Love this ball.. Feel is awesome, forgiveness is spot on.. Great product all in all!
customer_reviews.author: Wally martin

customer_reviews.title: easy to find in the rough
customer_reviews.text: For the price tey are a good deal, in my opinion. If you don't mind the bright orange color they perform pretty well. Not as good as proV1 but half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Nice balls. I bought them for a tournament and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice balls. I bought them for a tournament and lost 6 in the woods, deep. Probably not the fault of the balls.........
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Titleist Velocity
customer_reviews.text: A good durable golf ball but I didn’t notice any additional length as advertised. And has a hard feel when hit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brown

customer_reviews.title: Extra distance
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, I added 50 yards to my drives with this ball. Titleist does it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Ball
customer_reviews.text: Straight ball. Soft feel around the ground. Has helped my game tremendously without killing my wallet. My go to ball from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Eliah

customer_reviews.title: Really stand out from a distance
customer_reviews.text: The extra ‘whiteness’ on these balls allows you to ID your ball easier, especially if there’s 3 or 4 white balls in the fairway. It does happen occasionally! Plus I love the double digits.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nailling

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price for the best ball in golf. Worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: For me, a 12 handicap, this is all the ball I need. Like the feel and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Spot on. Love this ball for the value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: I like these balls for the price. I hit them better than the ProV1s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they have “New” on the box. These are 2016 models! I don’t want them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Nice deal for the money! Good quality and super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Castodio

customer_reviews.title: Best for the cost
customer_reviews.text: this ball fits my game, less spin, but still has a soft feel. And the Visi-white cover seems to be a little easier to spot in the weird winter sun angles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball
customer_reviews.text: Got free box at golf show. Hooked on this Orange Velocity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out these might used balls
customer_reviews.text: these are good quality balls, when I buy these from a local golf shop, the package is sealed, but received all open box with big packing tape on it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Somu25

customer_reviews.title: Willing to respond
customer_reviews.text: I like the distance and the feel. It works well for my old man game of golf.
customer_reviews.author: mark grim

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Balls!
customer_reviews.text: These golf balls are great! Nice feel, great durability! Titleist balls are the only ones!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Klose

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Have used them on a few rounds and love them. Would be even better if I didn’t keep leaving them in the water hazards!
customer_reviews.author: Dane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Chipped on iron Shots
customer_reviews.text: This ball chipped the cover on iron shots, it didn't hold up like it should.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Best balls I've used
customer_reviews.text: Awesome golf balls!! Added distance and accuracy to my game. Playing better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get my whole order.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two boxes and only received one box of golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H

customer_reviews.title: for the price $26
customer_reviews.text: for the price one of the best golf balls going
customer_reviews.author: Billy Keller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: How can one complain about tileist ball, they are the best
customer_reviews.author: robert g.davis
